src:
Pesan Pertama Andre Gomes untuk Fans Usai Jalani Operasi Engkel
07 Nov 2019, 16:45 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Gelandang Everton Andre Gomes akhirnya buka suara untuk pertama kalinya setelah ia mengalami cedera engkel horor saat bermain melawan Tottenham hari Minggu (03/11/2019).
Cedera engkel horor itu dialami oleh Gomes setelah ia terjatuh usai menerima tekel dari Son Heung-Min. Pemain asal Portugal ini kemudian berbenturan dengan bek Spurs Serge Aurier.
Engkel kaki kanannya mengalami dislokasi yang cukup parah. Pihak Everton pun langsung melarikan pemain asal Portugal ini ke rumah sakit.
Gomes pun langsung dioperasi. Prosedur itu berjalan dengan lancar dan pemain berusia 26 tahun itu sudah diperbolehkan pulang ke rumahnya sejak hari Selasa, 5 November 2019 kemarin.
text:
Andre Gomes' First Message to Fans After Operating Engkel
Nov 7 2019, 16:45 by Bola.net
Soccer - Everton midfielder Andre Gomes finally opened his voice for the first time after he suffered a horror ankle injury while playing against Tottenham on Sunday (03/11/2019).
Horror ankle injury was experienced by Gomes after he fell after receiving a tackle from Son Heung-Min. The Portuguese player then collided with Spurs defender Serge Aurier.
Engkel his right leg suffered a pretty severe dislocation. Everton immediately fled the Portuguese player to the hospital.
Gomes was immediately operated on. The procedure went smoothly and the 26-year-old has been allowed to go home since Tuesday, November 5, 2019 yesterday.
